name: Hot Tots (Trijam 88)
description:
HOT TOTS

This is my submission to Trijam 88, the three hour game jam.

Took me about 1 second over 3 hours to create (had to adjust the 3rd level's difficulty at the last second).

  CONTROLS:

  • Move the hot potato with the arrow keys.
  • Shoot your flamethrower with the space bar.
  • Roast all the other potatoes before the timer runs out!
